titleStmt.title: The Second part of the Lay-man's religion: as an appendix to the first. / Published to the memory of Queen Elizabeth, the late happy guardian of our established religion, this 17th of November, 1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Eliz. Holt, for Walter Kettilby at the Bishop's Head in St. Paul's Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
